Publish.LongDescription:
## Depot Capacity Redux
### Updated for 1.3.6* and Bridges DLC
### What it does
- **Depot capacity**: Bus, Taxi, Tram, Train, Subway scales the maximum vehicles per depot. - **Passenger capacity**: to increase how many passengers each vehicle can carry (bus,tram, trains, subway, airplane, ship, ferry) - Options menu sliders can be adjusted without restarting (100% - 1000%) - Does not use Harmony or Reflection, making it more compatible with other mods and less likely to break with game updates.
## Languages
- Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese)
### Notes - Depot capacity = maximum number of vehicles a single depot can maintain or spawn. - Passenger capacity = maximum passengers each vehicle can carry. - Supports switching cities, applies changes.
